Zoona (http://www.zoona.co.za)

Cape Town, South Africa

Zoona is a mobile payments company with a passion for helping businesses grow in Africa. In countries like Zambia (Zoonaâ€™s core market), businesses of all sizes struggle to grow because of challenges transacting in cash, low access to affordable finance and poor and unreliable data. We provide a payments platform, innovative financing, and data analytics to help people start mobile payment outlets and connect micro and small businesses to their suppliers.

In 2012 Zoona closed a $4m Series A venture capital round led by Omidyar Network and Accion. Zoona has grown to process millions of dollars in payment value each month in pursuit of its vision of Cashless Growing Businesses.

We're in a very exciting growth phase and looking for:

- Java Developers

- PHP Developers

- UI/UX Designers

- Data Scientists

If you're interested, I'm happy to chat more about the opportunities and the company: hans@zoona.co.za
